item.title: Modiphius Brings The Commonwealth to the Table with new Fallout: Factions Battle For Boston Starter Set
item.content:encoded:
Modiphius has announced a new Fallout: Factions starter set. The set, Fallout: Factions Battle for Boston, brings players into the post-apocalyptic world seen in Bethesda's RPG franchise, giving them the tools to get into this tactical miniatures game.

According to a press release, the Fallout: Factions Battle for Boston starter set is intended for two-players. The set will contain everything players need to play, including a rulebook, miniatures, battlemaps and punch-out terrain.

As the name implies, the starter set brings locations and factions from post-apocalyptic Boston, the setting of Fallout 4. The two armies in the set are the Brotherhood of Steel, the militaristic quasi-knightly guys in power armor, and the Institute, the clandestine synth robot faction. 

Fallout: Factions is just one game set in the Fallout universe developed by Modiphius. In addition to the official TTRPG, which recently announced a standalone solo mode, Modiphius also develops Fallout: Wasteland Warfare, a more narrative scenario-driven miniatures game.

This new starter set also coincides with the conclusion of second season of the Fallout TV show. The Prime Video series, produced and overseen by Person of Interest and Westworld showrunner Jonathan Nolan, has been praised for adapting Fallout's alternate history sci-fi setting, and for its interesting, three-dimensional characters. Characters so beloved they were added to these miniature games.

The Fallout: Factions Battle for Boston starter set contains the following:

  • A 106-Page Rulebook
  • A sprue of 12 hard plastic unpainted Institute miniatures and bases
  • A sprue of 8 hard plastic unpainted Brotherhood of Steel miniatures and bases
  • Four punch-out terrain sheets
  • A 3 x 2 double-sided battle map
  • A miniatures build guide
  • 100 tokens
  • 12 dice
  • 2 blank crew rosters
  • A tape measure

The Fallout: Factions Battle for Boston starter set is available for pre-order now on Modiphius' webstore. It is currently on sale at an MSRP of $135.
